Instruction 
Pop the bubbles according to ascending orders. 
The areas that you cannot touch will be showed at the start of the game for 5 second. 
So memorize those areas and Do not touch those areas. 
You will lose live either if you touch the areas that are not allowed to touch 
or if you touch the bubble in the wrong order. 
GOOD LUCK.
